title: I put in a ticket yesterday, and I'm worried Riot isn't going to reply to the requested e-mail
body: My account's password was recently changed without my consent and when I went to my e-mail connected to the account, that e-mail was made unavailable to me as well. I have several ways to prove this is my account, but when you guys go over 24 hours to reply to my ticket, I get the feeling you're trying to contact me through the account or e-mail I have no access to. I'd really love to get in touch with either Riot OR Yahoo, but yahoo doesn't accept almost any form of contact and the only way I can call for you guys is either through said ticket or this post. I've spent way too much money and way too much time on this game to just have it slip through my fingers like this and I'm freaking out. I'd really appreciate something from you guys. If you can help at all, please contact me through this account/e-mail.

replies.body:
Heyo TPP,

Well, our support system does reply by email. You still need an email to get emailed updates from your ticket. If you log into the same account you used when you created the ticket, you should be able to see any and all updates to the ticket that have happened since then. Even if you cannot access your original email, if you create a ticket with an email you are using, you should be able to get any and all updates relevant to your issue there!
The ticket is open on this account. I haven't gotten any replies to it yet.
You won't. Riot consistently ignores its player base's questions and idea's or cries for assistance or change.

Still no e-mail from Riot 3 days later despite stating in the ticket that I have no way to access my account. I gave them a contact e-mail but they aren't using it. Can I at the very least get an explanation as to why?

Having a similair issue my "main" login info doesnt work. Been waiting 3 days for an update the password must have been changed as well even though its been the same since 2013 as far as i know. Please riot.

It took a bit, but I got my account back! You may have your doubts, but Riot is here for you, just like they were for me! See you on the Summoner's Rift!
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Oh! Sorry buddy. Riot refuses to have an actual human customer service support system... you know. Like essentially every other civilized service company in the world. You might be screwed! ='(
Are you kidding me, their customer support was so patient with me and really understanding of my problem. Just think of Nexon, where they take half a year resolving ONE ticket.
I have an easier time dealing with Veterans Affairs ffs.
